about_the_game:
Survivors of the Three Kingdoms is a time survival game that combines the historical background of the Three Kingdoms with roguelike elements, featuring simple gameplay.

In this game, players will take on the role of a soldier, facing attacks from enemies in all directions. They must defeat these enemies and survive long enough to complete the level. As time goes on, the strength and number of enemies will increase. Players can obtain powerful new weapons or upgrade existing weapons by leveling up through enemy kills.

This game supports both mouse and keyboard controls, and during combat, players only need to use the arrow keys to move.

Currently, the game includes the following elements:

1. At the beginning, the soldier controlled by the player wields a spear, and through upgrades, they can acquire up to 6 different weapons, each with unique attack styles.
2. Players must dodge enemies during the game; if they come into contact with an enemy, their character will take damage. If health falls below zero, the game will fail.
3. Weapons can also be upgraded, enhancing options such as increasing damage, expanding attack range, extending duration, and reducing cooldowns.
4. The game features up to 10 different types of enemies, including chickens, dogs, snakes, wild boars, tigers, and regular soldiers of the Yellow Turban Rebellion from the Three Kingdoms period, as well as infantry, archers, cavalry, and sorcerers. These enemies have varying strengths and will spawn in waves to attack the player-controlled character as the game progresses.
5. Players must survive for 20 minutes without dying to complete the game.
